about_the_game:
*This is my first game, so there may be many imperfections. I hope everyone can be understanding. If you encounter any issues, feel free to email me, and I will start working on a solution as soon as I see it.

I hope this game brings joy to everyone!

[About Gameplay]

The core gameplay of [/i] is to raise characters and engage in PVP. In the open world, you can obtain new characters and enhance existing ones.

If you're feeling lazy, you can also AFK in the open world. With good luck, you may earn some rewards.

Of course, if you actively do something, such as using items or casting skills, the rewards will be greater.

There are also some Easter eggs in the game waiting to be discovered!

[Confusion from an Imperfect Tutorial]

  • The main character you bring into the game can actively cast skills, while non-main characters' skills are cast automatically.

  • There is a buff related to coins that, when clicked, grants a windfall.

  • In the open world, characters can receive skill-related upgrades. If you don't know what a skill does, feel free to pick one at random. (In-game skill details can be scrolled through, and you can also view skill details on the character selection page.)

  • If your main character dies, the game ends. Characters that die before your main character may have a chance to enter the capture list. On the settlement screen, you can choose one of the captured characters to take with you.

[Future Development Plans]

  • Add more interactive items to the open world

  • More events

  • Introduce additional characters

  • Add more skills to existing characters

name: CyberQuQu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: CyberQuQu is a card-collecting and character progression game. In the open world, do your best to level up your main character—get stronger, stronger, and even stronger! Take your powerful character into PVP to showcase your skills and claim the legendary title!
